#summary SQL DDL in Server Database
#labels Phase-Design

= Table Definition =

  * user(account_id, account, password, account_type, ipaddress, logged_in)

  create table user(account_id int, account varchar(20), password varchar(10), account_type int, ipaddress, varchar(20), logged_in varchar(5), primary key(account_id));
 
  * problem(problem_id, path_description, correct_input_filename, correct_output_filename)
 
  create table problem(problem_id int, path_description VARCHAR(50), correct_input_filename varchar(10), correct_output_filename varchar(10), primary key(problem_id));
 
  * submission(run_id, account_id, problem_id, lang, path_code, judge_id)

  create table submission(run_id int, account_id int, problem_id int, lang varchar(10), path_code varchar(50), judge_id int, primary key(run_id), foreign key(account_id) references user, foreign key(problem_id) references problem, foreign key(judge_id) references judge_type);
 
  * clarification(clar_id, msg)
  
  create table clarification(clar_id int, msg varchar(100), private_byte int, primary key(clar_id));
  
  * scoreboard(account_id, time, score)
  
  create table scoreboard(account_id int, time int, score int, primary key(account_id), foreign key(account_id) references user);
  
  * judge_type(judge_id, sentence)
  
  create table judge_type(judge_id int, sentence varchar(20), primary key(judge_id));
